text: José Carlos Castando de Almeida (14 June 1930 – 27 February 2022) was a Brazilian Roman Catholic prelate. He became a priest in 1953. He was titular bishop of 'Urusi' and as auxiliary bishop of the Roman Catholic Diocese of Santos, Brazil, from 1982 to 1987. He then was bishop of the Roman Catholic Diocese of Itumbiara, Brazil, from 1987 to 1994 and as bishop of the Roman Catholic Diocese of Araçatuba, Brazil, from 1994 until his resignation in 2003.Jose Carlos Castanho de Almeida Castanho de Almeida died on 27 February 2022, at the age of 91. ==References== Category:1930 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Brazilian Roman Catholic bishops Category:People from São Paulo (state)
title: José Carlos Castanho de Almeida
